title: My phone turn off every time i plug it in the charger,i live in Bahrain and i cant call the support
content:
I have a Pixel 2 XL, my phone turns off when i plug it into the charger.. actually the original charger doesn't charge my phone anymore and the commercial chargers does charge the phone but it turns off.

i tied couple of other charger, original and commercial and behavior i described earlier didn't change.

i thought i will call access the "Tips and support" on the phone menu and call the support, i was sent to a "Request callback" form, i filled in my information but it seems google don't provide a call back for people in Bahrain as i understood from the massage "either the number is incorrect or phone support is not available"

so, what should i do?! please help.
